locations.name: Lisbon
locations.description: Portugal's vibrant capital, known for its historic neighborhoods (Alfama, Chiado), colorful tiles, Fado music, 'miradouros' (viewpoints), and culinary scene.

locations.name: Comporta
locations.description: A chic, laid-back coastal enclave south of Lisbon, famed for its protected coastline, golden beaches, dunes, pine forests, rice paddies, and relaxed luxury.
